channel.title: scene on Solonka
channel.description: Recent content in scene on Solonka

item.title: Project 1: SA's Official Languages Classification
item.description: A project on Text Classification Machine learning. This project is a contribution to a kaggle challenge hosted by Explore Data Science Academy that involved creating a model that would be able to classify a text in any of South Africa’s 11 official languages and identify which language the text is in. Six models were built with the MultiNomial Naive Bayes model being the best perfoming with regards to F1 score and training time.

item.title: Chapter IV: Master Jacques Coppenole
item.description: While the pensioner of Ghent and his eminence were exchanging very low bows and a few words in voices still lower, a man of lofty stature, with a large face and broad shoulders, presented himself, in order to enter abreast with Guillaume Rym; one would have pronounced him a bull-dog by the side of a fox. His felt doublet and leather jerkin made a spot on the velvet and silk which surrounded him.
